channel.title: 317/474 item on item - help
channel.description: I am trying to add a code where if I use an item on another item it makes something but I can't figure out what to do. What file holds the codes for that? What would a code like that look like? I want to make it so if I use a gold bar on a ring mould it makes a gold ring and takes away the gold bar. Gold bar - 2357 Ring mould - 1592 Gold ring - 1635

item.title: 317/474 item on item - help
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Go into client.java and search for something like this:
if ((itemUsed == 265) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith
== 265)) {
Then after the barrack press enter and put yours… So yours would look like this :):

if ((itemUsed == 2357 || otherItem == 2357) && (itemUsed == 1592 || otherItem == 1592)) {
crafting(500, 1635, 1635, 0);

Similar to that. Post back it worked or if it didnt

Read full topic
